text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text: ru～ ruru～♪ The spring breeze is so soft……♪

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text: ——Oh? Up so early……

text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle
text_block_list.text: Hmm…… so these discs contain footage of best date pairs…… Maybe I should take the photo album too……

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text: Good morning, Miracle-san. Are you up this early because of committee work?

text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle
text_block_list.text: Good morning, Zephyr. This is…… just something personal.

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text: Personal……? Are those…… from past Droite's?

text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle
text_block_list.text: Yeah. I wanted to get some materials for Ruby. ……She's working really hard to get "best date."

text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle
text_block_list.text: From early morning to late at night…… Even between her busy schedule, she practices dancing. ——fully dedicated.

text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle
text_block_list.text: That's why, I want to help. Hopefully these materials help in some way.

text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle
text_block_list.text: Oh, if you're interested Zephyr, Shall I compile some for you as well?

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text: No thanks…… I'm going to leave it to Yamase winds, so it's fine.

text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle
text_block_list.text: Really? Well if you have any other questions or concerns, just let me know.

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text: Thank you. But…… what I'm most concerned about, is how busy you've been, Miracle-san.

text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle
text_block_list.text: Ahaha, don't worry about me. In fact, I'm just happy to help.

text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle
text_block_list.text: ——Oh. well, look at the time…… Sorry, I have some committee work to do so, I'll see you later.

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text: …………You're like a light breeze, frustrating. ——Never changing.

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text: (She always puts others before herself…… Always offering her hand to me.)

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text: (No matter how much you play it off, prioritizing someone else. No matter how much burden you put on yourself helping others.)

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text: (You still hide it behind a soft, light breeze…… saying it's for "someone else")

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text: (……I wonder, if Miracle-san will give up on herself ……for "someone else")

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text: ——Where are "you"……?

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: Ah, Zephachi～！！

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: Hey hey, could you listen to this? So…? Bad…?

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text: Well……it sounds like a sandstorm.

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: Rightー! Violin's stupid hard!! Guess I should do something else～? I thought the Princess would like the violin though.

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text: You wanted to play for Ruby-san?

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: Yeah! I really wanna be her date! I'm tryna really show off♡! Anyway I'll try something else! If you think of a cool instrument, lemme know!

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text: ——She's very honest about what she wants.

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text: If only Miracle-san…… could have a little bit of that……

text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle
text_block_list.text: So, would you like to take a look at the committee's costume rentals now? There's even more variations this year.

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text: Yes, please. I'll decide whether or not to rent one afterwards.

text_block_list.name: Bamboo Memory
text_block_list.text: Costume variations are nice but, Some variations in the planning would be nice too～.

text_block_list.name: Bamboo Memory
text_block_list.text: ——hm? Is there someone over there!?

text_block_list.name: Bamboo Memory
text_block_list.text: ……What are you doing, Helios?

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: Bamcham～! y'see, right now, operation Lovey ♡ Dovey Princess's best date is underway～! !

text_block_list.name: Bamboo Memory
text_block_list.text: Best……what?

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: Best date～ y'know, absolute win? Think! I'mma try it again!

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: I even sent out a serious invitation. For sure this time! My lady will fall in love with me!

text_block_list.name: Bamboo Memory
text_block_list.text: I see…… Well, in that case I'll watch——

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text: ——I have received your invitation. I have about 15 minutes until my next appointment, but I will hear what you have to say.

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: Princess～～! ! You came! ? I'm so happy～～! !

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text: Normally, I would ask you to contact me in advance, but I happened to have an open slot today.

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: Wha? Isn't that called Destiny! ? Alright, let's goーー! !
(Poo～～Poopoopoo～～～～Poopeee～～!!)

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: Pwaa～～! So! ? Everyone's staring at me☆

text_block_list.name: Bamboo Memory
text_block_list.text: I think it's a different kind of stare! ?

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: I mean, standing out's good! And・now・here's～～? ? Exciting da～～nce! !

text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle
text_block_list.text: Ahhaha～, you definitely stand out a lot……!

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: Right～! ? Best date material right! ?

text_block_list.name: Bamboo Memory
text_block_list.text: No hang on, getting best date's tough!

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text: fufufu. So how about a "fun award" instead?

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: Eh! Can't we win both!? Hey, Princess, you can get best date with————

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text: That seems to be impossible.

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: Huh?

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text: I'm very sorry, but I have to be somewhere soon, please excuse me.

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: Eh! ? W-wait, wait wait wait! ! Rejected again! ? What'd I do wrong! ?

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: PRINCESSーーーー! !
